Ciao Tutti - If you haven't had a chance to see this film you still have one more opportunity. Tonight @ 7:30pm.

It's an Italian film that has received praises and has won 9 Donatello Awards (Italy's equivalent to our Oscar Awards).

If any is interested please click on the links below for showtimes & a link to the film's official website.

Showtimes: http://www.cinestudio...

Directions: http://www.cinestudio...
Film's Official website: http://www.mybrotherf...

Admission is $8.00
One thing I recall about Cinestudio is that cash is the only form of payment they accept.

MY BROTHER IS AN ONLY CHILD
(Italy, 2007)
108 min


Director: Daniele Luchetti. Screenplay by Sandro Patraglia and Stefano Rulli, based on the novel Il Fasciocomunista by Antonio Pennacchi. Cast: Elio Germano, Riccardo Scamarcio, Diane Fleri.

The Best of Youth singlehandedly revived our love of Italian cinema, instantly becoming a favorite of Cinestudio audiences. This summer, The Best of Youth?s screenwriters have reunited to tell a new story of two brothers whose love/hate rivalry plays out in the bumpy politics of 1960s Italy. Older brother Manrico (Riccardo Scanarcio) is a handsome and charismatic Communist. Younger brother Accio (Elio Germano) valiantly fights to outdo him, first by joining a seminary, then by taking up with a group of young skinheads, Italian-style. The exhilarating swings between laughter, fighting, love (both fall for the same woman), and politics become a poignant tribute to that wellspring of many dramas - the family. Winner of 9 Donatello Awards (the Italian Oscars) including Best Actor (Elio Germano), Best Screenplay, and Best Cinematography.
